events.message: I want to request a refund for my recent order because the product did not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied with it.
The issue raised by the customer has been identified as a refund request related to dissatisfaction with the product.
This case has been assigned to agent Emily R. for handling the refund inquiry and next steps.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request and ensure you have a smooth experience.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you would like to request a refund, so I can assist you better?
My order number is 12345678. The item arrived late and the quality was not as described on the website, so I want my money back.
Thanks for the details. I have processed your refund request and you should receive the money back in 5-7 business days.
Thank you for handling this so quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund and your assistance throughout the process.
The refund has been confirmed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you have further questions.
We’re checking in to make sure your refund has been received. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if you need further help.
Since we have not heard back from you, we are now closing this case. Thank you for reaching out to us, and have a great day!
